Package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type

Class ValueBase

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.ValueBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
SVGPaint, SVGPathElement, SVGTransform
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: ValueBase.java 1074 2023-10-02 12:05:06Z tquadrat $") @API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.0.5") abstract sealed class ValueBase extends Object permits SVGPaint, SVGPathElement, SVGTransform
The abstract base class for SVG type class, providing some helper methods.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: ValueBase.java 1074 2023-10-02 12:05:06Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.0.5
